snippet: Seven people, some of them members of a taxi union, were fatally shot in a bar in Cancún, several miles from the city’s popular beachfront resorts, the authorities said Thursday.
abstract: Mexican authorities say seven people, some of them members of taxi union, were fatally shot in bar in Cancun; say motive is under investigation and possibility of involvement of organized crime gangs, which have targeted taxi workers in other states, had not been ruled out.
lead_paragraph: Seven people, some of them members of a taxi union, were fatally shot in a bar in Cancún, several miles from the city’s popular beachfront resorts, the authorities said Thursday.
